name: Bona Fighter 2020
description:
Controls:

arrow keys (up & down)

spacebar = shooting

Simple space shooter developed in Godot engine. I will update the game as I progress. 

The idea for the game name came from my kids. Bonas will be big space stations, which you need to shoot down as you progress through the game.

Thanks

For graphical assets:

https://hexadecimalwtf.itch.io/space-pixels

Godo engine:

https://godotengine.org/
